website_summaries.verdict: Bohemian-style 59-inch round beach towel with fringe. It's available in eight colorful mandala-inspired designs.
pros: Thicker than an average beach towel
Microfiber absorbs seven times its weight in water
Can be used for multiple purposes, such as a yoga mat, play mat, picnic table cover, decorative throw, or beach cover-up
cons: Some reports of damage from machine-washing
Thinner than a few purchasers expected

customer_reviews.title: This round beach towel feels like an actual beach towel where as I have found ...
customer_reviews.text: This round beach towel feels like an actual beach towel where as I have found other round towels do not. It does have fringe on the ends, but I have washed and dried as I would any of my other beach towels and have not had any unraveling what so ever. It has very vibrant colors and is very large. I have ordered 3 and plan to order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the shape and the colors. Not sure how it will hold up over time since the material seems thin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my granddaughters to take to the beach. I had to get another one for my daughter. These are colorful and seem to have a lot of room. They do seem to be on the thin side. I expected them to be a lot thicker
customer_reviews.author: Georgiagirl34

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. Looks just like the pic
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Looks just like the pic. Covers this old fat lady up better than a regular beach towel. It can also be used for a table cloth in my own opinion. I would buy this again. It washed very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seward

customer_reviews.title: Faded with first wash
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful- perfect for the beach faded and colors ran after the first wash- not so beautiful anymore- but still useful- just yuckie looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors, even after washing
customer_reviews.text: Nice towel, not super thick or absorbent, but the colors have remained vibrant with washing and the fringe has stayed intact and still looks new. Would definitely recommend for more of a beach blanket or to protect something. I use it to protect my comforter from dogs jumping on the bed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this - it is comfy and I love the colors. I use it on top of the carpet when I'm stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Kara  Dubb

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun and Chic!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our daughter for her birthday and she loved it! It is a super fun addition to your beach attire! It is well-made with catchy colors! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: So impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this beach towel is very thick. After reading some of the reviews I thought the quality may have been very low. I have washed twice and it looks great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Towel, using it as a decoration
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this towel as a seat cover for a round chair I have in my office. It looks really great and ties the room together, and will be easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Love

customer_reviews.title: Not thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and the recipient thought it was a tablecloth because it is not as thick as a towel. I purchased Because I read the reviews about it being nice and thick. So I suppose thickness is a relative term but I have been assured it is not thick like a beach towel. It is really pretty and she was more excited about it being an outdoor tablecloth.
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Unique
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the round green and blue. It is soft, beautiful and unique. I ordered another as a gift and they loved it so much they wanted to use it as an outdoor table cloth in their Florida room. Very happy with this purchase so far. I haven’t washed it yet but I will update my review if it doesn’t wash well.
customer_reviews.author: NTX Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
